title: Hickman Co. deputy's daughter accidentally shot
content:
CENTERVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
A Hickman County deputy's daughter was accidentally shot at her home in the 3800 block of Swan Creek Road in Centerville.
Sheriff's officials said the shooting happened around 3 p.m. Friday.
The girl was transported to Maury Regional Hospital, then flown to Vanderbilt University Medical Center.
Hickman County Sheriff Randal Ward did not know how she was shot, who shot her or her condition.
Channel 4 has a crew en route to the scene and will have more details as they become available.
